Uses of Class
net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.util.Point3f

  • Packages that use Point3f 
    Package Description
    net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.util  

    • Uses of Point3f in net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.util

      Methods in net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.util that return Point3f 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Point3f Point3f.clone()
      Create a new Point at the same location as the current one.
      Point3f Camera.getLocation()
      Get the Point3f instance that hold the location of the Camera at the current time.
      Point3f Point3f.minus(float x, float y, float z)
      Subtract the values from the given values with this Point.
      For example:
      Point3f p1 = new Point3f(3, 6, 1);
      Point3f p2 = p1.minus(1, 6, 4);
      p2 contains the values (2, 0, -3).
      Point3f Point3f.minus(Point3f p)
      Subtract the values from the given Point with this Point.
      For example:
      Point3f p1 = new Point3f(3, 6, 1);
      Point3f p2 = new Point3f(1, 6, 4);
      Point3f p3 = p1.minus(p2);
      p3 contains the values (2, 0, -3).
      Point3f Point3f.plus(float x, float y, float z)
      Add the values from the given values to this Point.
      For example:
      Point3f p1 = new Point3f(3, 6, 1);
      Point3f p2 = p1.plus(1, 6, 4);
      p2 contains the values (4, 12, 5).
      Point3f Point3f.plus(Point3f p)
      Add the values from the given Point to this Point.
      For example:
      Point3f p1 = new Point3f(3, 6, 1);
      Point3f p2 = new Point3f(1, 6, 4);
      Point3f p3 = p1.plus(p2);
      p3 contains the values (4, 12, 5).

      For example:
      Point3f p1 = new Point3f(3, 6, 1);
      Point3f p2 = new Point3f(1, 6, 4);
